title: Sound On: Drone Ambassador Mark Hamill on Helping Ukraine
itunes:title: Sound On: Drone Ambassador Mark Hamill on Helping Ukraine
description:
Joe spoke with Star Wars actor Mark Hamill on his work as Ukraine'e "Ambassador of Drones", Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Emily Wilkins live from Las Vegas with a report on the Senate and governors races. Plus, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on Putin's barrage of drone strikes in Ukraine, the Nevada senate race between Catherine Cortez Masto and her opponent Adam Laxalt, inside the Florida debate of Marco Rubio and Val Demmings and the 35th anniversary of Black Monday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
